TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_iluc, title = iluc, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/iluc} }

S.FORM: iluc (Hulam a kamu: 嫩枝；後代子孫) u adidi'ay atu ngazuay a kikul i kilang atu lutuk. u wawa ku ilucilucam nu tademaw.
iloc (Holam a kamo: 嫩枝；後代子孫) o adidi'ay ato ngazoay a kikol i kilang ato lotok. o wawa ko ilocilocam no tademaw.
